services.name: Custom software development
services.description: Creating tailor-made software applications for clients based on their specific business requirements and needs.

services.name: Web application development
services.description: Building custom websites for businesses or individuals, including front-end and back-end development, content management systems, and e-commerce solutions.

services.name: Mobile application development
services.description: Creating custom mobile apps for Android and iOS platforms, including design, development, and testing.

services.name: Database development and integration
services.description: Building and integrating databases for businesses to help manage data, including data modeling, database design, and integration with other software systems.

services.name: API development and integration
services.description: Developing custom APIs to connect software systems and data, including designing and implementing RESTful APIs.

services.name: Cloud-based application development
services.description: Developing and deploying applications on cloud platforms like Amazon Web Services (AWS) or Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
